name: Legion War
description: "Legion War" is a 4X strategy game in a fantasy setting. You can build and expand your territory, explore unknown lands, and search for mysterious treasure, cultivate your own heroes and troops while exterminating your opponent's, and challenge the god who rules the world behind the scenes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 2.50GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD4400 Storage: 2 GB available space
